All of their internal cost inside of the ...
On which is which is an add on to whatever you're paying your advisor [noise] so I Would say it's very

There expense ratio and there are twelve be one fees and transaction cost and where you find those are in the perspective is now I think people should read the prospect of says there's good information in there but most people when you survey them if you if you ask them what they do with their perspective is uh they may glance at them but most of them ... or they'll throw them away

Is we can take someone's portfolio what they currently have and we can tell them it's not sort of pie this guy stuff for opinion It's MORNING star reports and things that are very credible we can actually take their portfolio which are loaded into morning star and it's going to tell us what they're paying an internal cost
So if for example just this last week I did one of these for a couple
